body:
I'm using centos7 with a spack-installed gcc@8.3.0, and root@6.20.04. When I try to `spack load gcc; spack load root` and compile something that creates a dictionary (e.g. podio), root errors with `#include <string_view> not found`. This does not occur when using the system compiler on other machines, or using the spack compiler wrappers.
@HadrienG2 @chissg @drbenmorgan any ideas?
title: [root] dictionary generation fails when using spack-installed compilers
